Package org.vraptor.config

Interface Summary
ConfigItem A configuration item.
 

Class Summary
ComponentConfig Models the xml portion to deal with component classes.
Configuration Base class for vraptor configuration.
ConverterConfig Models the xml portion to deal with component classes.
PluginConfig Models the xml portion to deal with factory classes.
Property A configuration property.
RegexViewManagerConfig Configures the view manager.
VRaptorConfiguration Basic vraptor configuration pojo.
XMLConfigurationLoader Reads the xml configuration file.
 

Exception Summary
ConfigException Something bad happenned during configuration
